Title: Clarifies the standard for intentional discrimination or retaliation claims
Summary: Clarifies the standard for intentional discrimination or retaliation claims by requiring a person or persons prove that an unlawful motivation was a motivating factor and not "the sole motivating factor" or a "but-for cause" of the challenged treatment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to clarifying the standard for intentional discrimination or retaliation claims
